item.title: Chicago’s Mayor Announces New Hotels For O’Hare Airport to Make Spending a Night Easier
item.creator: Associated Press
item.description: Many airport hotels are trending upwards in their quality and convenience but there are still many more not yet up to par with modern travelers and not prepared to handle growing passenger traffic around the world. -Dan Peltier

item.title: Resort’s Plan to Trademark ‘Park City’ Doesn’t Sit Well with Residents
item.creator: Associated Press
item.description: This move is probably not going to endear Vail Resorts to locals in Park City, regardless of efforts to "safeguard businesses and use advertising" to help people tell the difference between the resort and city. -Hannah Sampson

item.title: Airbnb Sues San Francisco to Prevent New Rules That Enforce a Law Airbnb Wrote
item.creator: Eric Newcomer, Bloomberg
item.description: Yes, we get how ridiculous this headline is. Just as we get how ridiculous the situation now is between destinations and Airbnb. Please, let's see real cooperation on both sides. Not political posturing by cities or claims of defending the middle class by Airbnb. -Jason Clampet

item.title: Marriott-Starwood Deal Gets Antitrust Clearance From the European Union
item.creator: Deanna Ting, Skift
item.description: Starwood shareholders probably want Marriott's stock price to rebound following the Brexit vote if they want to get a better deal from the merger. -Deanna Ting
